Class Utility.SlashSnipes

Provides sniping functionality to retrieve and display previously deleted or edited messages.

Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Utility
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("snipe", "Snipe edited or delete messages!")]
public class Utility.SlashSnipes : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<UtilityService>, IInteractionModuleBase

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

SlashSnipes(DiscordSocketClient, InteractiveService, GuildSettingsService, BotConfigService)

Provides sniping functionality to retrieve and display previously deleted or edited messages.

Declaration
public SlashSnipes(DiscordSocketClient client, InteractiveService interactiveService, GuildSettingsService guildSettings, BotConfigService config)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient client
InteractiveService interactiveService
GuildSettingsService guildSettings
BotConfigService config

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

EditSnipe(IMessageChannel?, IUser?)

Snipes edited messages for the current or mentioned channel. This command requires guild context.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("edited", "Snipes edited messages for the current or mentioned channel", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task EditSnipe(IMessageChannel? channel = null, IUser? user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IMessageChannel channel

The channel to snipe messages from. If null, defaults to the current channel.
IUser user

The user to filter sniped messages by. If null, messages by all users are considered.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sniping an edited message.
| Edit this page View Source

EditSnipeList(int, ITextChannel, IUser)

Lists the last 5 edited snipes for the current or mentioned channel, unless specified otherwise. This command requires guild context and the appropriate permissions to execute.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("editedlist", "Lists the last 5 edit snipes unless specified otherwise.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task EditSnipeList(int amount = 5, ITextChannel channel = null, IUser user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int amount

The number of edited messages to retrieve, defaults to 5.
ITextChannel channel

The specific channel to check for edited messages. If null, checks the current channel.
IUser user

Filters the snipes by the specified user. If null, retrieves messages edited by any user.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of listing edited snipes.
| Edit this page View Source

Snipe(IMessageChannel?, IUser?)

Snipes deleted messages for the current or mentioned channel. This command requires guild context.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("deleted", "Snipes deleted messages for the current or mentioned channel", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task Snipe(IMessageChannel? channel = null, IUser? user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IMessageChannel channel

The channel to snipe messages from. If null, defaults to the current channel.
IUser user

The user to filter sniped messages by. If null, messages by all users are considered.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of sniping a deleted message.
| Edit this page View Source

SnipeList(int, ITextChannel, IUser)

Lists the last 5 deleted snipes for the current or mentioned channel, unless specified otherwise. This command requires guild context and the appropriate permissions to execute.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("deletedlist", "Lists the last 5 delete snipes unless specified otherwise.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task SnipeList(int amount = 5, ITextChannel channel = null, IUser user = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int amount

The number of deleted messages to retrieve, defaults to 5.
ITextChannel channel

The specific channel to check for deleted messages. If null, checks the current channel.
IUser user

Filters the snipes by the specified user. If null, retrieves messages deleted by any user.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of listing deleted snipes.
| Edit this page View Source

SnipeSet(bool)

Enables or disables the sniping functionality for the server. This command requires administrator permissions.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("set", "Enable or Disable sniping", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task SnipeSet(bool enabled)
Parameters
Type Name Description
bool enabled

True to enable sniping, false to disable.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of setting the snipe functionality state.
